【Upgrade 3 in 1 Wireless Charging Station】Wireless Charging Station for Apple products,Saves your costs.Fast 3 in 1 charging station is equal to one charging station for iWatch, one Phone charging stand, 1 charging dock for AirPods. Wide compatibility to cover all IOS devices, Compatible with iPhone 14/14 Pro/14 Pro Max/13/13 Pro/13 Pro Max/13 mini/12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/12 mini/11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS/XR/XS MAX/X/8/8Plus & iWatch SE/6/5/4/3/2 & AirPods Pro/3/2/1. A must device for apple fans.
【Simplify Charging,Simplified Life】Only need one cable to charge for iphone, apple watch and airpods simultaneously, bring you an effortless charging experience, no more tangled cords trouble.Also, easy to find the “sweet spot” to charge, just simply place your phone on the stand and this wireless charger stand will do the rest. The Charging station for multiple devices apple is very suitable as a Christmas gift,Thanksgiving gift or birthday gift for friends.
【Intelligent Protection&Sleep Friendly Charging Pad】Our wireless charging stand with lightweight design, space saving,base with anti-slip silicone design so that the charger will not move or flip, to ensure that your phone is protected when charging; Besides, features a blue LED indicator when charging. If place this on nightstand, the blue light is a soft and not dazzing, virtually won’t lights up the entire room, no need to worry that it will prevent your sleep from being affected.
【What You Will Get】Our package includes 1* Wireless Charger iPhone,1*18W wall adapter,1*USB-C Charging Cable,1*User Manual,Worry-free 24-Month Warranty.One device allows you to have a clean desk and a beautiful smile,Please rest assured of the quality of our products that every product we send to you has gone through a series of quality inspection procedures. if you have any question on this wireless iphone charger, please contact us we will offer you a best solution within 24 hours.

1【16 Color Sunset Light & 4 Flashing Modes】The sunset lamp projector build-in RGB led, 16 kinds of light effect and 4 dynamic modes(Flash/Strobe/Fade/Smooth Effect) to choose from, provides a comfortable and romantic atmosphere. There are so many choice, you would find one you like.Suitable for children’s rooms, bedrooms, creating a different sunset projector light atmosphere, let you enjoy your leisure time and your family.
2【Smart APP and Remote Control Sunset Lamp】This is a smart sunlight lamp, you can change color of light, adjust brightness of lamp, choose light mode of this sunset lamp projector to make it become a party light or night light through APP on the phone or the remote control; Super convenient and versatile!
3【Portable size Rotatable and Adjustable】The lamp tripod can be rotated and adjusted.The Sunset Lamp head can be rotated 360 degrees, By changing the rotation angle and distance of the illuminator, different circular lights can be emitted from different angles, thereby bringing different effects. The farther the distance is, the larger the projection projected on the wall or ceiling.
4【Widely USE】It is very suitable for use as a background for photos, live broadcast and Vlog video shooting, as well as decoration for bedrooms, living rooms, corridors, cafes, studios, theme restaurants, bars, etc. At the same time, it is also very suitable for occasions such as dating, marriage proposal, parties, birthdays, family celebrations, garden parties and so on.
5 【365 DayQuality Assurance】If you are not 100% satisfied with sunset lights, just contact us and we will refund or replace your product immediately. If you have any questions about our sunlamp, please contact us first, and our support team will try to help you solve all problems…

Price: $86.99 - $40.87
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:18:55 UTC – Details)


DIY and professional mechanics trust Schumacher Electric’s extensive line of battery chargers and maintainers to keep their automotive, power sports, motorcycle, and marine batteries in top condition. The Schumacher SC1280 15A 6V/12V Fully Automatic Battery Charger and Maintainer is specifically designed to keep your 6V and 12V batteries fully charged and in optimum health. With a 15A rapid charge and a 3A charge/maintain mode, the SC1280 charges batteries quickly and then maintains a full charge while connected. Choose the 15A rate for charging automotive, marine, and light truck batteries. For smaller batteries, such as those used in garden tractors, snowmobiles, and motorcycles, select the 3A rate. Microprocessor controlled, the Schumacher SC1280 automatically adjusts the amperage rate during charging and maintaining as necessary. The unit also features auto voltage detection, float mode monitoring to maintain optimal battery charge, and multi-stage charging. Additional features include reverse hook-up protection, bad battery detection, a digital display, LED indicators, push-button controls, and color-coded clamps.
FULLY AUTOMATIC: The Schumacher SC1280 automatically detects 6V and 12V batteries. When the battery is fully charged, the unit automatically stops charging and shifts to maintain mode.
MICROPROCESSOR CONTROLLED: After gathering information from the connected battery, the microprocessor adjusts voltage and charge, allowing fast charging without negatively impacting battery capacity and longevity.
BOOST BATTERY HEALTH: The unit features multi-stage charging and float-mode monitoring for optimum battery health and extended battery life.
COMPATIBLE BATTERIES: The Schumacher SC1280 will charge 6V and 12V standard, AGM, gel, and deep-cycle batteries.
REVERSE HOOK-UP PROTECTION: With advanced reverse hook-up protection, the charger protects against damage if the clamps are not properly connected.

Essential Charging and Maintaining

Keep Batteries in Top Condition

Keep 12V batteries in optimum condition with the Schumacher SC1280 15A 6V/12V Fully Automatic Battery Charger and Maintainer. The SC1280 features auto voltage detection, multi-stage charging, float mode monitoring, bad battery detection, and reverse hook-up protection.

Advanced Battery Charging Technology

FLOAT MODE MONITORING

While in float mode, a battery maintainer delivers a small current when necessary to keep the unit fully charged.

MULTI-STAGE CHARGING

Keep your batteries in top condition with Schumacher’s advanced charging algorithm for optimum battery health.

BUILT-IN SAFETY

The SC1280 prevents battery damage with reverse hook-up protection, which stops the charger from operating if the clamps are reversed.

MULTI-FUNCTION DISPLAY

Use the display to check battery voltage, charging status, and percent of charge. The LEDs denote charging and maintain status and clamps reversed.

YOU CAN RELY ON SCHUMACHER

KEEP IT ROLLING WITH SCHUMACHER’S LINE OF BATTERY CHARGERS/MAINTAINERS

Professional mechanics and automotive enthusiasts trust Schumacher Electric to provide high-quality and innovative automotive products. Since 1947, Schumacher has been designing and producing industry-leading power conversion technology. Schumacher’s current range of products includes EV chargers, traditional battery chargers, maintainers, jump starters, portable power stations, diagnostic tools, battery accessories, LED work lights, lithium-powered products, and more.


Previous page

  1. HOME GARAGE

    Every home garage should have a quality Schumacher battery charger/maintainer.

  2. POWER SPORT RIDERS

    The SC1280 ensures that your motorcycle, ATV, and other power sports batteries are ready to play.

  3. CAR RESTORERS

    The unit’s maintain mode can keep your battery in top condition during restoration.

  4. BOATERS

    The unit can be used to maintain marine batteries, although they should be maintained on shore.

Next page

1 HOME GARAGE 2 POWER SPORT RIDERS 3 CAR RESTORERS 4 BOATERS

Samsung Galaxy A22 5G mobile was launched on 2nd June 2021. The phone comes with a 6.60-inch touchscreen display. Samsung Galaxy A22 5G is powered by an octa-core processor. It comes with 4GB of RAM. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G runs Android 11 and is powered by a 5000mAh battery. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G supports proprietary fast charging. As far as the cameras are concerned, the Samsung Galaxy A22 5G on the rear packs a triple camera setup featuring a 48-megapixel primary camera with an f/1.8 aperture; a 5-megapixel camera with an f/2.2 aperture; a 2-megapixel camera, and a 2-megapixel camera with an f/2.4 aperture. The rear camera setup has autofocus. It has a single front camera setup for selfies, featuring an 8-megapixel sensor with an f/2.0 aperture. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G runs One UI Core 3.1 is based on Android 11 and packs 64GB of inbuilt storage (up to 1000GB). The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G is a dual-SIM (GSM) mobile that accepts Nano-SIM mobile. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G measures 167.20 x 76.40 x 9.00mm (height x width x thickness) and weighs 203.00 grams. It was launched in Grey, Mint, and Violet color. Connectivity options on the Samsung Galaxy A22 5G include Wi-Fi, GPS, USB Type-C, 3G, and 4G (with support for Band 40 used by some LTE networks in India). Sensors on the phone include accelerometer, ambient light sensor, proximity sensor, and fingerprint sensor.
128GB ROM, 4GB RAM, Expandable MicroSD, MediaTek MT6833 Dimensity 700 5G (7 nm), Octa-core, Mali-G57 MC2
Dual-SIM (GSM) mobile that accepts Nano-SIM mobile. Rear Camera: 48MP, F1.8 + 5MP, F2.2 + 2MP, F2.4 (depth), Front Camera: 8MP, F2.0
2G Bands: 850, 900, 1800, 1900MHz, 3G Bands: 850, 900, 1700, 1900, 4G LTE Bands: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 12, 17, 20, 26, 28, 38, 40, 41 , 66
5G Bands: N1(2100), N3(1800), N5(850), N7(2600), N8(900), N20(800), N28(700), N66(AWS-3) N38(2600), N40(2300), N41(2500), N78(3500). May not get 5G as it is not available in all regions. Please check with your carrier for compatible 5G Bands.
International Model compatible with Most GSM Carriers in US and Global like T-Mobile, AT&T, MetroPCS, etc. Will NOT work with CDMA Carriers Such as Verizon, Sprint.

More display means more room to play: Expand your view to the 6.5-inch Infinity-V Display of Galaxy A12 Nacho and see what you’ve been missing. Thanks to HD+ technology, your everyday content looks sharp, crisp and clear. Upgrade your mobile photography with Quad Camera: Snap memorable moments in clear detail with the 48MP Main Camera. Expand the viewing angle with Ultra Wide Camera. Customize focus with Depth Camera, or get closer to the details with Macro Camera. Power that keeps you going: Stay ahead of the day with a battery that won’t slow you down. The 5,000mAh (typical) battery lets you keep doing what you do, for hours on end. And with up to 15W of Adaptive Fast Charging, Galaxy A12 Nacho quickly gets back to full power. Give yourself more room to play: Galaxy A12 Nacho combines Octa-core processing power with up to 4GB of RAM for fast and efficient performance for the task at hand. Enjoy 128GB of internal storage.

From the brand

New Arrivals

Pink Tool Set

Drills & Pliers

Screwdrivers & tool bags

Longer Lasting Power: the pink drill set is powered by a powerful 12-Volt, 1.5 AH Lithium-ion battery for enough power for a full range of applications.
Compact and Lightweight Design: the pink drill driver allows users to carry out drilling/driving tasks in confined spaces and offers users greater comfort and efficiency on the job site.
Multiple Purposes: the pink power drill features a 3/8 in. keyless chuck with a 19-position clutch adjusts torque output to control the depth of the screw or fastener. The drill is designed with variable 2-speed settings (0-400 rpm and 0-1500 rpm) for multiple purposes.
Notice：This is a carbon brushes drill. It is normal that the brushes produce sparks from the electromagnetic charge which are clearly visible inside the drill.
The pink drill set for women is perfect for your home use or gifts.

12V Cordless Drill Set includes:

(1) 12V Cordless Drill Driver;

(1) 12V 1.5AH Lithium-Ion Battery;

(10) HSS6542 drill bits:1/16, 5/64, 3/32, 7/64, 1/8, 9/64, 5/32, 11/64, 3/16, 1/4;

(20) Screwdriver bits: Slotted 1/8”, 5/32”, 3/16”, 7/32”, 1/4”, 9/32”, POZI: PZ0, PZ1, PZ2, PZ3; Philips: PH0, PH1 X 2, PH2 X 5, PH3 X 2;

(10) Nut drivers: 5/32, 3/16, 7/32, 1/4, 9/32, 5/16, 11/32, 3/8, 7/16, 15/32;

(1) 60mm magnetic extension bar;

(1) Battery Charger;

(1) Tool bag;

FASTPRO 12V Pink Drill Driver

FASTPRO 12V Lithium-ion Cordless Pink Drill Driver Set powered by a powerful 12-Volt, 1.5 AH Lithium-ion battery for enough power for a full range of applications. The power drill features a 3/8 in. keyless chuck with a 19-position clutch adjusts torque output to control the depth of the screw or fastener. The drill is designed with variable 2-speed settings (0-400 rpm and 0-1500 rpm) for multiple purposes. The compact and lightweight design allows users to carry out drilling/driving tasks in confined spaces and offers users greater comfort and efficiency on the job site. Its built-in LED light to illuminate work surfaces and allows users to quickly change attachments for any project need.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:25:05 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Upoy Charging Hub [New Releases]

–Overview:

4 USB-A + 2 USB-C fast charging ports, 5V-8A, 45W charger adapter, compatible with most kinds of electronic gadgets.

–Features:

“Lightweight”, “space saver”, “versatile”, “compact”, “fast charging”, “portable”, “kawaii”.

–Scenarios:

travel, cruise, desk accessories.

desktop cable management.

gifts for men, women, girls, boys.

If you are hesitating which charger you need…

Electronic Gadgets&Apple Accessories

apple chargers for iphone

Charging station for multiple devices apple, usb power strip supports 6 devices at same time!

charger for apple watch

Usb wall charger for apple watch, compatible with usb-a and usb-c charging cord, a single charging adapter does not need to be replaced!

chargers for Ipad

Ipad charging station fast charging, no matter for c port or lightning port, upoy multi usb port charger does the job!

Charger for Airpods

Charging blocks for all kinds of airpods, No need to take off your airpods case, automatically stop while full charging!

Personal charging hub cruise essentials: Charging tower with 4 usb-a and 2 usb-c ports, glossy shell&small footprint; travel accessories for men, women, teens.
Cell phone chargers & power adapters: Charger block total 8A, USB adapter compatible 5W/10W/15W/20W, kawaii desk accessories for Iphone/Samsung.
Universal chargers for multi electronics: Integrated charging accessories for Smart Phone, Tablet, Headphone, Kindle, Oculus, Gaming Controller and more.
Desktop cable management: Charging station 6 ports with 5 ft power cord; Compact, Lightweight, Space saving, Portable, Versatile, USB charging hub for 6 devices simultaneously.
Charging dock with multiple protection: Built-in smart IC against overload, overvoltage, over-temperature, over-charge and short circuits.

Previous page

  2. Upoy is a young and creative brand into electronic gadgets.

    With a group of funny people and a professional supply chain, our vision is to bring world a serie of products with “Unique Style”, “Great Value”, “Reliable Quality”.

    If you also have a restless soul, welcome to join us on the road of exploration.

  3. USB Charging Station

    Visit the Store

  4. Cruise Essentials Charger Cube

Next page
